name: Sapa Trekking Tour and Homestay 2 days
description: Trek along Muong Hoa Rive which is surrounded by huge rice paddy terraces. You can see the daily life of the local people with the difference minorities such as: H’Mong, Zay, Red Dzao. The night you spend in Tavan village, the unique village in Sapa area where Zay minority live here, it will be an excellent trip with a deep memory.
